feed.title: CHIEN LAB
feed.subtitle: Our group's research focuses on integrated circuits and their convergence with bio- and quantum technologies. We are dedicated to creating sensors and devices for point-of-care diagnostics and emphasizing continuous monitoring through wearables, implantable devices, injectables, and swallowables. Additionally, we explore millimeter-wave ICs for communication, sensing, and interfaces for qubits. Please come talk to us if you’re interested in!

entry.title: NSF Award
entry.content: Our lab recently receives a NSF Grant to devleop smart health devices for continuos monitoring!
entry.summary: Our lab recently receives a NSF Grant to devleop smart health devices for continuos monitoring!

entry.title: R21 Trailblazer Award
entry.content: Our team recently receives a NIH R21 Trailblazer Award to develop silicon-based molecular diagnostics!
entry.summary: Our team recently receives a NIH R21 Trailblazer Award to develop silicon-based molecular diagnostics!

entry.title: Awards
entry.content: Congratulations to the NTU RF team to receive TSRI (Taiwan Semiconductor Research Institute) Outstanding Research Award! Congrats!

author.name: Ying-Han You, Pin-Yu Lin, Sih-Ying Chen

entry.summary: Congratulations to the NTU RF team to receive TSRI (Taiwan Semiconductor Research Institute) Outstanding Research Award! Congrats!

entry.title: France-Berkeley Fund (FBF)
entry.content: We are receiving support from France-Berkeley Fund (https://fbf.berkeley.edu/) to develop the next-generation CMOS flow cytometry!
entry.summary: We are receiving support from France-Berkeley Fund (https://fbf.berkeley.edu/) to develop the next-generation CMOS flow cytometry!

entry.title: Awards
entry.content: Congratulations to the NTU RF team to receive MediaTek Outstanding Research Award! Keep up the good work!

author.name: Ying-Han You, Pin-Yu Lin, Sih-Ying Chen

entry.summary: Congratulations to the NTU RF team to receive MediaTek Outstanding Research Award! Keep up the good work!

entry.title: Medicine Innovates Series
entry.content: Our CMOS/microfluidics flow-cytometry-on-CMOS system has been highlighted in Medicine Innovates series (https://medicineinnovates.com)! Please see link below: https://medicineinnovates.com/ghz-frequency-microfluidics-integrated-cmos-platform-label-free-cellular-dielectric-spectroscopy/. We believe that by miniaturizng electronics using a millimeter-sized chip yet at high performance will ofer the pathway for the next-generation medical biosensing devices.
entry.summary: Our CMOS/microfluidics flow-cytometry-on-CMOS system has been highlighted in Medicine Innovates series (https://medicineinnovates.com)! Please see link below: https://medicineinnovates.com/ghz-frequency-microfluidics-integrated-cmos-platform-label-free-cellular-dielectric-spectroscopy/. We believe that by miniaturizng electronics using a millimeter-sized chip yet at high performance will ofer the pathway for the next-generation medical biosensing devices.

entry.title: ECS invited talk
entry.content: Prof. Jun-Chau Chien will give an invited talk at 245th ECS meeting at San Francisco on CMOS/aptamer implantables for in vivo continuous molecular monitoring.
entry.summary: Prof. Jun-Chau Chien will give an invited talk at 245th ECS meeting at San Francisco on CMOS/aptamer implantables for in vivo continuous molecular monitoring.

entry.title: GE role
entry.content: Prof. Jun-Chau Chien will serve as the Guest Editor for IEEE Journal of Solid-State Circuits (JSSC) for ISSCC 2024 special issue.
entry.summary: Prof. Jun-Chau Chien will serve as the Guest Editor for IEEE Journal of Solid-State Circuits (JSSC) for ISSCC 2024 special issue.

entry.title: Paper Acceptance
entry.content: Ying-Han’s 60-GHz PLL paper using SWO has been accepted to IEEE Microwave and Wireless Technology Letter! Congratulations!

author.name: Ying-Han Chen, Pin-Yu Lin, Sih-Ying Chen

entry.summary: Ying-Han’s 60-GHz PLL paper using SWO has been accepted to IEEE Microwave and Wireless Technology Letter! Congratulations!

entry.title: Fellowship
entry.content: Congratulations to our NTU lab member Wei-Yang on receiving the Berkeley-Taiwan Fellowship!
entry.summary: Congratulations to our NTU lab member Wei-Yang on receiving the Berkeley-Taiwan Fellowship!
